tasks.task_description: Test adding a non-existent MCP server to see error handling
Check if error messages are clear and informative
Verify that failed installations don't corrupt the config
Test with a valid server package that exists

description: Test MCPProxy error handling for non-existent packages and installation failures
context: Attempted to add non-existent server @modelcontextprotocol/server-weather but tool was interrupted. Need to check logs and error handling.
No new log file for test-nonexistent-server found. The server was not added to the system, indicating proper error handling prevented invalid server addition.

MCPProxy is running correctly on port 8080. Process ID 30767 is active and listening. The /mcp/ endpoint returns HTTP 200, indicating the server is responding properly. The issue with interrupted tool calls appears to be user-initiated interruptions, not server problems.
